text:
Delays  Posted: 11/15/2017 12:22PM

[2], [3], [4] and [5] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal maintenance at Eastern Pkwy-Brooklyn Museum.

Planned Work
SIGNAL MAINTENANCE

Days, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Tue to Thu, Nov 14 - 16

For service to these stations, take the [2] to 241 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2].

For service from these stations, take the Bx39 bus instead.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Days, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Fri, Nov 13 - 17

No Woodlawn-bound service at 161, 167, 170 Sts, Mt Eden Av, 176, 183 Sts, Fordham,
Kingsbridge Rds, Bedford Park Blvd and Mosholu Pkwy.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For service to 161, 167, 170 Sts, Mt Eden Av and 176 St, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer
to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service to 183 St, Fordham, Kingsbridge Rds, Bedford Park Blvd and Mosholu Pkwy, take the [4] to Woodlawn and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av or 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer
to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

For service from these stations, take the [7] to Junction Blvd or 74 St

Detour is as follows:

*65 St and 5 Av, Madison Av and 65 St, and 68 St and Madison Av bus stops will NOT be made. Customers may use the 68 St and Lexington Av bus stop instead.

Eastbound M72: Via 72 St, left on Central Park West, right on 81 St into 79 St Transverse Rd, right on 5 Av, left on 72 St to Madison Av and regular route.

*Central Park West between 70 St and 67 St bus stops will NOT be made. Customers may use the 72 St and Central Park West bus stop instead.

*68 St and 5 Av bus stop will NOT be made. Customers may use the 72 St and Madison Av bus stop instead.

*Madison Av between 65 St and 70 St bus stops will NOT be made. Customers may use the 72 St and Madison Av bus stop instead.

name: Montauk
text:
Planned Work
Buses Replace Midday Trains between Patchogue & Montauk on Weekdays

To accommodate track work, buses will replace midday, off-peak trains between Patchogue and Montauk from Monday, November 13 through Friday, November 17. The track work will take place from 8:01 AM until 5:00 PM each day. Service will be affected as follows:

Westbound
  • The weekday trains that usually depart Montauk at 11:18 AM and 2:51 PM, and the train that usually departs Speonk at 2:00 PM will originate in Patchogue. Customers at stations Montauk through Bellport will board buses to Patchogue, then connect with train service to points west.
  • Customers will board buses up to 1 hour and 5 minutes later than normal train time.

Eastbound

  • The 8:57 AM and 11:27 AM trains from Babylon and the 11:25 AM train from Jamaica will terminate in Patchogue. Customers will transfer to buses for transportation to stations Bellport through Montauk.
  • Please plan for up to 41 minutes of additional travel time/
For additional information, pick up a special Montauk Branch Timetable or see https://goo.gl/5WS5NB

name: Port Jervis
text:
